sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,u.register_time, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat from b2b_user.uuc_user u left join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id left JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on bcr.company_id=d.developer_id inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract con on d.developer_id=con.company_id and con.sign_status=1 left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON FIND_IN_SET(con.contract_area,wi.respon_areas) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where u.user_biz_type=2 and uui.user_id is null and datediff(now(),u.register_time)=1 union ALL select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,u.register_time, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat from b2b_user.uuc_user u INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id left join b2b_company.uuc_developer d on uui.company_id=d.developer_id inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract r on d.developer_id=r.company_id AND r.`sign_status`=0 left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a1 on d.reg_province_code=a1.item_code left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area a2 on d.reg_city_code=a2.item_code left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON (FIND_IN_SET(a1.item_name,wi.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(a2.item_name,wi.respon_areas)) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where u.user_biz_type=2 and datediff(now(),u.register_time)=1

item.description: 开发商注册1个月未认证

sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,u.register_time, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat from b2b_user.uuc_user u left join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id left JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on bcr.company_id=d.developer_id inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract con on d.developer_id=con.company_id and con.sign_status=1 left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON FIND_IN_SET(con.contract_area,wi.respon_areas) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where u.user_biz_type=2 and uui.user_id is null and datediff(now(),u.register_time)=31
sql-item.description: 开发商注册1个月未认证

item.description: 开发商注册2个月未认证

sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,u.register_time, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat ,c0.last_month,c1.dev_num,c2.supp_num,c3.business_num,c4.supp_in_storage_num from b2b_user.uuc_user u left join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id left JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on bcr.company_id=d.developer_id inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract con on d.developer_id=con.company_id and con.sign_status=1 left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON FIND_IN_SET(con.contract_area,wi.respon_areas) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid cross JOIN ( select DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%c') as last_month )c0 cross join ( select if(count(company_id)<10,58,count(company_id)) as dev_num from b2b_user.uuc_company_contract where date_format(area_sign_date,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y%m') ) c1 cross join ( select if(count(DISTINCT a.company_id)<100,568,count(DISTINCT a.company_id)) as supp_num From b2b_user.uuc_user_identity a INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where b.user_biz_type=1 and date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y%m') ) c2 cross join ( select if(sum(cnt)<20,126,sum(cnt)) as business_num FROM ( select count(uid) cnt From b2b_bidding.bid_announcements where date_format(created_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y%m') union ALL select count(item_id) cnt from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where date_format(create_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y%m') ) a )c3 cross join ( select if(count(DISTINCT supplier_id)<100,117,count(DISTINCT supplier_id)) as supp_in_storage_num From b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where storage=1 and date_format(storage_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y%m') ) c4 where u.user_biz_type=2 and uui.user_id is null and datediff(now(),u.register_time)=61
sql-item.description: 开发商注册2个月未认证

item.description: 开发商注册3个月未认证

sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,bcr.mobile,w.openid,u.register_time, case when wi.user_name is null then '燕燕' else wi.user_name end consultant_name, case when wi.wx_code is null then 'yuncaigou01' else wi.wx_code end consultant_wechat from b2b_user.uuc_user u left join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity uui on u.user_id=uui.user_id left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id left JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer d on bcr.company_id=d.developer_id inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract con on d.developer_id=con.company_id and con.sign_status=1 left join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo wi ON FIND_IN_SET(con.contract_area,wi.respon_areas) AND wi.business_type=1 left join ( SELECT w.userid,w.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser w inner join m_yct.zq_user u on w.openid=u.openid WHERE w.wxappid=@appid group by w.userid ) w on u.user_id=w.userid where u.user_biz_type=2 and uui.user_id is null and datediff(now(),u.register_time)=91
sql-item.description: 开发商注册3个月未认证
